example.eg: It's against company policy to date a co-worker.
example.egtrans: 办公室恋情是违背公司政策的。

example.eg: It's not my policy to kiss on the first date.
example.egtrans: 第一次约会就接吻有违我的原则。

example.eg: We need a new car insurance policy.
example.egtrans: 我们需要一份新的汽车保险。

example.eg: Tom carries his insurance policy in his coat.
example.egtrans: 汤姆将他的保险单放在外套里。

example.eg: It's good policy to wear a seat belt.
example.egtrans: 坐车系安全带是好习惯。
州长做出政策方面的决策。

example.eg: It's hard to say whether his failures were greater in his domestic policy or in his foreign policy.
In light of recent events, we will need to reconsider our foreign policy.
When confronted with crime, police advise residents to adopt a hands-off policy.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不干涉政策, 静观态度，旁观策略, 绥靖政策

example.eg: My health insurance policy won't cover my diabetic medication.
The country decided to adopt an open-door economic policy.
My boss has an open-door policy -- he wants his employees to feel comfortable talking to him any time.
A permanent life insurance lasts for the lifetime of the policy holder.
Policy wonks are calling for the government to scrap the planned increase in fuel tax.
Policymakers in Washington have finally reached an agreement after weeks of debate and discussion.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 决策人, 制定政策的人
立法, 制定法律, 制定政策

example.eg: The pricing policy for the wine distributor takes into account the probability of shortages of desired products.
This chapter of the book covers the effect of public policy on business.

dsense.name: scorched earth policy
dsense.guideword: (military: destruction of enemy crops) (军队撤退时销毁一切敌军可利用之物)

example.eg: General Sherman initiated a scorched earth policy on his march to the sea through Georgia.
The police are implementing a tough policy on drink driving.
